query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customEvidences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  standardId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  grades TEXT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  customFields TEXT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  ownerNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YLZPes1ubcofMz.root --database PdwWnVF2DAatRAKFwvgWXk --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customEvidences (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  standardId INT NOT NULL,
  evidenceName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  grades TEXT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(255),
  customFields TEXT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  ownerNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP NULL
)
